resources.string:
Hi, my name is Joseph 

I am a student at College of Southern Nevada 

I have been studying programming for two years now 

This summer I had an internship at Allegiant Air 

I learned a lot from my time there and I was very grateful for the opportunity to learn with real professionals 

I will graduate this Winter. When I graduate I plan to attend Western Governors University for my bachelor's degree 

I really enjoy programming and I can't say how happy I am that I decided to become a programmer 

My plan is to become a software engineer once I get my Bachelors, but I'll be happy to get any programming job
